body:
## Expected Behavior
Making a `GET` request to `/api/v1/namespaces/<namespace>/batch-operations?pageSize=5` returns 5 Batch Operations

## Actual Behavior
Making a `GET` request to `/api/v1/namespaces/<namespace>/batch-operations?pageSize=5` returns _all_ Batch Operations (up to the visibility maximum page size set via dynamic config)


## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

  1. With temporal server running (and > n batch operations created) invoke the ListBatchOperations API, `/api/v1/namespaces/<namespace>/batch-operations?pageSize=n`
  1. Notice > n batch operations are returned
  1.

## Specifications

  - Version: 1.22.0
  - Platform: all
title: `ListBatchOperations` API does not respect `pageSize` in request URL query parameters
